Title: Relates to driving while ability impaired by fatigue and aggravated driving while ability impaired by fatigue
Summary: Relates to driving while ability impaired by fatigue and aggravated driving while ability impaired by fatigue; makes aggravated driving while ability impaired by fatigue a misdemeanor.
LawCode: Add ยง1212-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to driving while ability impaired by fatigue and aggravated driving while ability impaired by fatigue
